A: 1. The Joystick is used to play computer _ (a) games (b) music (c) videos (d) documents
2. A Joystick is an _ device. (a) output (b) input (c) storage (d) processing
3. The Monitor has a _ screen. (a) round (b) triangular (c) rectangular (d) square
4. A Monitor is used to show _ from the computer. (a) sounds (b) smells (c) words (d) food
5. The Printer is an _ device. (a) input (b) output (c) storage (d) processing
6. A Printer is shaped like a _ (a) ball (b) cone (c) box (d) cylinder
7. A Printer transfers data from the computer to _ (a) screen (b) paper (c) speaker (d) keyboard
8. A Speaker is used to transfer _ from the computer. (a) light (b) sound (c) data (d) images
9. You can listen to _ from computers using a speaker. (a) books (b) music (c) pictures (d) silence
10. The system unit is made up of the CPU, disk drive, and _ (a) monitor (b) keyboard (c) motherboard (d) mouse
11. The system unit is often called _ (a) RAM (b) ALU (c) CU (d) CPU
12. Which of these is a drive found in the CPU? (a) Flash drive (b) Printer (c) Monitor (d) Speaker
13. The CPU has a CD/DVD disk drive and a _ drive. (a) sound (b) floppy disk (c) paper (d) light
14. The Control Unit (CU) is a part of the _ (a) Monitor (b) Printer (c) Speaker (d) CPU
15. RAM is a part of the _ (a) ALU (b) CU (c) CPU (d) Hard disk
16. The CPU performs _ operations. (a) emotional (b) logical (c) manual (d) artistic
17. The CPU stores data in the _ unit. (a) display (b) memory (c) print (d) sound
18. Storage devices store data for _ use. (a) current (b) future (c) temporary (d) immediate
19. Which of these is a storage device? (a) Joystick (b) Speaker (c) Hard disk (d) Printer
20. A storage _ does not use electricity. (a) drive (b) disk (c) unit (d) device

5. What kind of devices store data for future use? _________
